ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync List resource to update.

Sid.description: The SID of the Sync List resource to update. Can be the Sync List resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.

CollectionTtl.description: How long, [in seconds](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/limits#sync-payload-limits), before the Sync List expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.

Ttl.description: An alias for `collection_ttl`. If both are provided, this value is ignored.

$ul: **account_sid**: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Sync List resource.

**created_by**: The identity of the Sync List's creator. If the Sync List is created from the client SDK, the value matches the Access Token's `identity` field. If the Sync List was created from the REST API, the value is `system`.
**date_created**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

**date_expires**: The date and time in GMT when the Sync List expires and will be deleted, specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format. If the Sync List does not expire, this value is `null`. The Sync List might not be deleted immediately after it expires.
**date_updated**: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.
**links**: The URLs of the Sync List's nested resources.
**revision**: The current revision of the Sync List, represented as a string.
**service_sid**: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) the resource is associated with.
**sid**: The unique string that we created to identify the Sync List resource.
**unique_name**: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource. It can be used in place of the resource's `sid` in the URL to address the resource.
**url**: The absolute URL of the Sync List resource.
